description: Sent when a board is added to the configuration.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD LUM-EQUIPMENT-MIB::equipmentBoardRowStatusActive LUM-EQUIPMENT-MIB::equipmentBoardIndex u 9999 LUM-EQUIPMENT-MIB::equipmentBoardName s EXAMPLE LUM-EQUIPMENT-MIB::equipmentBoardLastChangeTime s EXAMPLEE

description: An arbitrary index assigned to each
board entry.
variables.name: LUM-EQUIPMENT-MIB::equipmentBoardIndex

description: The name of the board, for example 'tpmr2500:1:2'
where the first number indicates in which sub-rack
the board is present and the second number
in which slot.
variables.name: LUM-EQUIPMENT-MIB::equipmentBoardName

description: The time when the operational state of the
board entry was last changed.
variables.name: LUM-EQUIPMENT-MIB::equipmentBoardLastChangeTime

description: Sent when a board is removed from the
configuration.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD LUM-EQUIPMENT-MIB::equipmentBoardRowStatusDestroy LUM-EQUIPMENT-MIB::equipmentBoardIndex u 9999 LUM-EQUIPMENT-MIB::equipmentBoardName s EXAMPLE LUM-EQUIPMENT-MIB::equipmentBoardLastChangeTime s EXAMPLEE

description: An arbitrary index assigned to each
board entry.
variables.name: LUM-EQUIPMENT-MIB::equipmentBoardIndex

description: The name of the board, for example 'tpmr2500:1:2'
where the first number indicates in which sub-rack
the board is present and the second number
in which slot.
variables.name: LUM-EQUIPMENT-MIB::equipmentBoardName

description: The time when the operational state of the
board entry was last changed.
variables.name: LUM-EQUIPMENT-MIB::equipmentBoardLastChangeTime

description: Sent when a board is physically inserted.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD LUM-EQUIPMENT-MIB::equipmentBoardRowStatusInserted LUM-EQUIPMENT-MIB::equipmentBoardIndex u 9999 LUM-EQUIPMENT-MIB::equipmentBoardName s EXAMPLE LUM-EQUIPMENT-MIB::equipmentBoardLastChangeTime s EXAMPLEE

in which slot.

variables.name: LUM-EQUIPMENT-MIB::equipmentBoardLastChangeTime

description: Sent when a board is physically removed.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD LUM-EQUIPMENT-MIB::equipmentBoardRowStatusRemoved LUM-EQUIPMENT-MIB::equipmentBoardIndex u 9999 LUM-EQUIPMENT-MIB::equipmentBoardName s EXAMPLE LUM-EQUIPMENT-MIB::equipmentBoardLastChangeTime s EXAMPLEE

description: Sent when a board is deleted from the
configuration.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD LUM-EQUIPMENT-MIB::equipmentBoardRowStatusDeleted LUM-EQUIPMENT-MIB::equipmentBoardIndex u 9999 LUM-EQUIPMENT-MIB::equipmentBoardName s EXAMPLE LUM-EQUIPMENT-MIB::equipmentBoardLastChangeTime s EXAMPLEE
